mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, Thomas Nelson to George Weedon, 1780 October 30
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Nelson, Thomas, 1738-1789
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Thomas Nelson, signer of the Declaration of Independence and brigadier general in the Continental army, writes to General George Weedon, of Richmond, updating him on the mobilization of Virginia's defenses against a British incursion in the Hampton Roads area. Autograph letter signed, 1 page, with integral address panel and partial red wax seal.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: United States -- History -- Revolution, 1775-1783
